segments.text: I can't believe my eyes with this scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kitchen looks ordinary at first glance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Woman at the sink, towel in hand, plate shining.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But water's overflowing, she hasn't a clue.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle spreading under her feet silently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's adventure on the stool catches me off guard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got cookies in hand, balancing like a pro.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Though that stool's leaning back dangerously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The little girl watches, ready to catch her treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's mischievous, but endearing in a way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window lets in fresh air from the garden.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she'll turn around soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
